content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Process_ProcessStatistics_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize AvgThreadCount = avg(ProcThreadCount_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Total System Thread Timeline

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Process_ProcessStatistics_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize AvgInputDelayMs = avg(ProcInputDelaySumMs_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Average Input Delay Per Process Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize AvgCPU = avg(ProcCPUPercent_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: System CPU Usage Timeline

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Process_ProcessStartup_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| extend StartupTimeSeconds = round(StartupTimeMs_d / 1000.0, 2)
| top 50 by StartupTimeSeconds desc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ProcUser_s, ProcName_s, ["Startup Time (s)"] = StartupTimeSeconds
| order by ["Startup Time (s)"] desc
content.title: Top 5 Processes by Startup Delay at Logon

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
| extend ProfileLoadSeconds = round(ProfileLoadTimeMs_d / 1000.0, 2)
| summarize AvgProfileLoad = avg(ProfileLoadSeconds) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
content.title: Profile Load Time Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
| extend GpoProcessingSeconds = round(GroupPolicyTotalProcessingTimeMs_d / 1000.0, 2)
| summarize AvgGpoProcessing = avg(GpoProcessingSeconds) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Group Policy Processing Time Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
| extend ShellStartupSeconds = round(ShellStartupTimeMs_d / 1000.0, 2)
| summarize AvgShellStartup = avg(ShellStartupSeconds) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Shell Startup Time Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
| extend PreLogonSeconds = round(PreLogonInitTimeMs_d / 1000.0, 2)
| summarize AvgPreLogon = avg(PreLogonSeconds) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Pre-Logon Delay Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Logon_GroupPolicyCSEDetail2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
| summarize AvgCseDurationS = round(avg(CseDurationS_d), 2) by CseName_s, Computer
| top 10 by AvgCseDurationS desc
| project Computer, CseName_s, AvgCseDurationS
| order by AvgCseDurationS desc
content.title: Top 10 Slowest Group Policy CSEs

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

let TopCSEs = 
    uberAgent_Logon_GroupPolicyCSEDetail2_CL
    | where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
    | where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
    | summarize AvgCseDurationS = avg(CseDurationS_d) by CseName_s
    | top 10 by AvgCseDurationS
    | project CseName_s;

uberAgent_Logon_GroupPolicyCSEDetail2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or User_s has UserFilter
| where CseName_s in (TopCSEs)
| summarize AvgCseDurationS = round(avg(CseDurationS_d), 2) by Computer, CseName_s
| project ["Computer"] = Computer, ["CSE Component"] = CseName_s, ["Avg. Duration (s)"] = AvgCseDurationS
| order by ["Avg. Duration (s)"] desc
content.title: Group Policy Procesing Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgDiskReadLatency = avg(IOLatencyMsRead_d), AvgDiskWriteLatency = avg(IOLatencyMsWrite_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Storage Latency During Logon Time
Logon Process Timeline View

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');

uberAgent_Process_ProcessStatistics_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize MaxInputDelayMs = max(ProcInputDelayMaxMs_d) by ProcName_s, Computer
| top 10 by MaxInputDelayMs desc
| project Computer, ProcName_s, MaxInputDelayMs
content.title: Input Delay
